caption.p: ( A, B) Annual changes of PC1 and PC4, HA of the R group human strains ( n = 83). The numbers indicate the last digit of the year. The colours indicate the estimated branches of evolution. Other PC axes are presented in Fig. S4C. ( C) Leaps found in the group R strains. In the last branch (grey), the values did not change in PC1, but they reverted in PC2 after 30 years. The numbers indicate the last two digits of the year. ( D) Annual changes in H1 (1) and H3 (3) patient counts in Japan.
